Rapat Perdana Menag di DPR, Polemik Cadar-Celana Cingkrang Ikut Dibahas
07 Nov 2019, 11:04 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - Menteri Agama (Menag) Fachrul Razi hari ini mengikuti rapat kerja perdana dengan Komisi VIII DPR yang membidangi persoalan agama. Meski agenda utama adalah soal anggaran, polemik pernyataan Fachrul soal cadar dan celana cingkrang ikut disinggung.
Rapat dibuka oleh Ketua Komisi VIII DPR, Yandri Susanto. Politikus PAN ini mengaku ingin mengonfirmasi langsung ke Fachrul soal pernyataannya terkait cadar dan celana cingkrang.
"Beberapa pernyataan Pak Menteri yang saya kira penting untuk konfirmasi langsung di forum terhormat ini. Misalkan bagaimana pak menteri menyatakan bahwa cadar dan celana cingkrang perlu diatur sedemikian rupa terutama di ASN," kata Yandri saat rapat di Gedung DPR, Senayan, Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Dari pernyataan-pernyataan Fachrul itu, Yandri menilai seolah ada pandangan bahwa cara berpikir seseorang terkait dengan cara berpakaian seseorang. Hal itu lalu jadi pro kontra.
"Menurut kami terlalu dini pak dan terlalu mensimpelkan masalah, cara berpakaian orang, cadar, cingkrang, blue jeans, dan sebagainya itu disangkutpautkan dengan perilaku orang, apalagi dengan radikal. Oleh karena itu penting kita menyelesaikan persoalan pro kontra ini sehingga energi yang besar kita pindahkan pada hal-hal konstruktif dan produktif," ungkap Yandri.
Yandri mengatakan perdebatan soal hal ini sudah cukup panjang. Dia menyinggung pernyataan BNPT yang menyebut radikalisme tidak ada hubungannya dengan cara pakaian. Oleh sebab itu, dia meminta agar Fachrul memberi penjelasan.
"Mohon Pak Menteri jelaskan secara transparan saja nanti sehingga bisa kita kanalisasi menjadi perdebatan yang positif," ujarnya.
Hingga saat ini, rapat Komisi VIII dengan DPR masih berlangsung. Menag Fachrul Razy sedang menjelaskan soal anggaran Kemenag.

(imk/haf)

Prime Minister of Religion Meeting in the House of Representatives, Polemic Cingkrang-Pants Cingkrang Participated Discussed
Nov 7 2019, 11:04 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - Minister of Religion (Menag) Fachrul Razi today attended the inaugural working meeting with the House of Representatives Commission VIII in charge of religious matters. Although the main agenda is about the budget, the polemic of Fachrul's statement about the veil and trousers is also mentioned.
The meeting was opened by the Chair of the House Commission VIII, Yandri Susanto. This PAN politician claimed he wanted to confirm directly with Fachrul about his statement related to the veil and trousers.
"Some of the statements of the Minister that I think are important for direct confirmation in this honorable forum. For example, how the minister stated that the veil and pants should be arranged in such a way, especially at ASN," Yandri said at a meeting at the Parliament Building, Senayan, Jakarta, Thursday (Thursday) 11/7/2019).
From Fachrul's statements, Yandri considered as if there was a view that a person's way of thinking was related to the way someone dressed. That then became the pros and cons.
"In our opinion, it is too early, sir, and it is too simple to solve the problem, how to dress people, the veil, the cingkrang, blue jeans, and so on is related to people's behavior, especially radical. Therefore, it is important that we resolve this problem of pros and cons so we move large energy on constructive and productive matters, "said Yandri.
Yandri said the debate about this matter was long enough. He mentioned BNPT's statement that said radicalism had nothing to do with clothing. Therefore, he requested that Fachrul give an explanation.
"Please ask the Minister to explain transparently later so that we can channel it into a positive debate," he said.
Until now, the Commission VIII meeting with the DPR is still ongoing. Minister of Religion Fachrul Razy is explaining the matter of the Ministry of Religion budget.

(imk / haf)
